page.title: 09THE TRAFFIC IN NEWBURY
page.content:
Newbury is a very busy place because the traffic from the north of England is slowing down the local traffic.The traffic going through Newbury from the M4 is travelling to Southampton or Portsmouth.Owing to the docks in these two towns there are many large, noisy vehicles rumbling along our ring road.
Some people are thinking of building a fly-over to ease the local traffic.If it is built it will be much easier to get around our town by car.
The car parks are often full but because there are so many you are bound to find a parking space except on Thursdays when the open air market is held.
